title: About/关于
content: Why such website exists Once having fun with friends we talked about funny puzzles since I have seen many of them I would like to propose the bests of my collections having a memory of golden fish I never remember the details hence I collect them here in order to have access from my phone I will be pleased to add your collection here if you leave me a message in the comment area

title: distrait passenger
content: 100 passengers enter the cabin in order the first 10 passengers are distrait and randomly choose their seat Other passengers comes in order they will seat at their seat if it was not taken or randomly choose an available seat otherwise What is the Fun that the very last passenger seat in his own seat
